original_text: But he that cometh against him shall do according to his own will, and none shall stand before him: and he shall stand in the glorious land, which by his hand shall be consumed.
korean_text: 오직 와서 치는 자가 자기 마음대로 행하리니 그를 당할 사람이 없겠고 그는 영화로운 땅에 설 것이요 그의 손에는 멸망이 있으리라

sentences.original_text: But he that cometh against him
shall do according to his own will
and none shall stand before him
sentences.korean_translation: 아무도 그 앞에 서지 못할 것이라

sentences.original_text: and he shall stand in the glorious land
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 영광의 땅에 서게 될 것이니

sentences.original_text: which by his hand shall be consumed
sentences.korean_translation: 그 땅이 그의 손에 의해 소진될 것이라
